This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record the existence of a class of activity.
An individual activity is what happens, perhaps merely continued existence without change, to an individual physical object during a period of time.
Membership of a class of activity may indicate the nature of an individual activity.
the existence of a class of activity.
individual activity; Individual activity is within the scope of the Activity_as_individual application module.
membership of a class of activity; Membership of a class of activity is within the scope of the Activity_structure_and_classification application module.
relationships between classes of activity; Relationships between classes of activity are within the scopes of the Class_of_composition_of_activity and Class_of_connection_of_activity application modules.
class_of_involvement of things in an activity. Class of involvement is within the scope of the Class_of_involvement_in_activity application module.
The Class_of_activity UoF identifies a class of activity, action or process.
